title: Unpatched Zimbra flaw under attack is letting hackers backdoor servers
description: The flaw has been under attack since at least early September.

title: Florida tokers inadvertently smoked rat poison; 52 sickened, 4 dead
description: It's not the first time rat poison has shown up in fake weed.

title: Post-impact images of DART mission have not disappointed
description: Ground, space-based telescopes, and a nearby cubesat have all captured the impact.

title: After 23 years, Weather Channel’s iconic computerized channel is shutting down
description: Cult-favorite Weatherscan TV service launched in 1999; hobbyists aim to keep it alive.

title: Why Chris Pratt’s performance in the Mario movie trailer is so distracting
description: Even kids can tell something is a little off with Mario's new voice.

title: No Man’s Sky adds tons of quality-of-life improvements alongside Switch launch
description: Substantial changes focus on difficulty, flow, and inventory management.

title: Amazon “suicide kits” have led to teen deaths, according to new lawsuit
description: Lawsuit claims Amazon is No. 1 seller of deadly chemical used in suicides.

title: Twitter knows you took a screenshot, asks you to share instead
description: Users are being prompted to share (monetizable) links instead of screen images.

title: Elon Musk can’t be trusted to complete merger, Twitter tells judge
description: Twitter says there's a financing problem and that Musk won't commit to closing date.

title: Pixel 7 Pro teardown shows better cooling, cleaner layout than last year’s model
description: A cleaner layout enables more thermal tape over the SoC, camera, and battery.

title: In sudden reversal, Valve will let a cult classic visual novel onto Steam
description: Steam-maker also promises "changes to avoid situations like this in the future."

title: Binance blockchain suffers $570 million hack
description: World’s largest crypto exchange targeted in security breach.

title: What happened to the virtual reality gaming revolution?
description: VR hasn't taken over the world, but that doesn't mean it has failed.

title: Rocket Report: Falcon Heavy launch on tap; South Korea seeks Russia alternative
description: Also, the Ariane 6 rocket is inching closer to the launch pad.

title: Acer’s Ryzen 6000-powered Swift Edge laptop has a 16-inch OLED screen for $1,500
description: The AMD-based Swift Edge is bigger and OLED-ier than the Intel-based Swift ultralight.
